scripts.generate-mobile-api: node fetchMobileSwagger.js && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --skip-validate-spec -i ./swaggerMobileApi.json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/Mobile-Api/Swagger -Dio.swagger.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true -Dio.swagger.v3.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true && prettier --write ./src/Mobile-Api/Swagger/api.ts
scripts.generate-auth-api: node fetchAuthSwagger.js && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --skip-validate-spec -i ./swaggerAuthApi.json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/Auth-Api/Swagger -Dio.swagger.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true -Dio.swagger.v3.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true && prettier --write ./src/Auth-Api/Swagger/api.ts
scripts.generate-finalization-api: node fetchFinalizationSwagger.js && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --skip-validate-spec -i ./swaggerFinalizationApi.json -g typescript-axios -o ./src/Finalization-Api/Swagger -Dio.swagger.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true -Dio.swagger.v3.parser.util.RemoteUrl.trustAll=true && prettier --write ./src/Finalization-Api/Swagger/api.ts
